name: S.E.C. Inc. 打怪特勤隊
description:
S.E.C.Inc. (Supernatural Event Control Incorporation) is a monster-hunting business simulation video game, in which players manage agents, receive requests to help civilians and eliminate monsters.

is my 5th self-sponsored project. It was started since July 2021. It is under construction. It is assumed to be publish on mobile platforms.

Feedback, opinions, or comments are welcomed by post comment, private message, or a survey form in the game. Please follow our Facebook post for latest progress: https://www.facebook.com/SECIncorporation
